summary: Shopify merchants also have access to Jack Mallers' Strike, Coinbase Commerce and BitPay.
title: Shopify Expands Crypto Payment Options With Crypto.com Pact
content: Merchants using e-commerce platform Shopify (SHOP) now have access to Crypto.com as another way for accepting cryptocurrency payments.
